DOC.brief_summary: Coronary revascularization improve survival patient coronary artery disease . However , many patient leave poor physical mental health . Traditional cardiac rehabilitation involve moderate intensity continuous exercise ( MICE ) . Alternatives traditional cardiac rehabilitation programming may however provide superior understudied benefit patient poor physical mental health . Nordic walk ( NW ) high-intensity interval training ( HIIT ) two example alternative program cardiac rehabilitation , may provide superior physical mental health benefit compare traditional MICE . The main purpose project , therefore , determine short long term physical mental health benefit alternative cardiac rehabilitation modality , include NW HIIT exercise capacity , quality life depression 12-week program .
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Effects Cardiac Rehabilitation eXercise Modalities Physical Mental Health Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Patient CAD recently undergo PCI ( within 210 week ) PCI coronary artery bypass grafting ( within last 18 week ) ; Patient refer University Ottawa Heart Institute cardiac rehabilitation program ; Patient able walk independently Patient willing attend onsite cardiac rehabilitation program twice weekly 12 week ; At least 40 year age ; Patient willing able provide inform consent Currently participate routine exercise training ( > 2x/week ) and/or use Nordic Walking pole ; Active infection inflammatory condition ; Over 75 year age ; Persistent permanent atrial fibrillation ; Pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant trial period ; Unstable angina establish diagnosis chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , severe mitral aortic stenosis , hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy ; Unable read understand English French ; Unwilling unable return followup visit week 12 26 ;
